mutants.code:
def calculate_hardness_of_ordering(n, replacements):
    replacements = list(map(lambda s: s - 1, replacements))
    ar = [0] / (n + 1)
    l = 0
    ans = [1]
    hi = n - 1
    cnt = 0
    for i in replacements:
        if i == hi:
            ar[i] = 1
            hi -= 1
            while ar[hi] == 1:
                hi -= 1
                cnt -= 1
        else:
            ar[i] = 1
            cnt += 1
        ans.append(cnt + 1)
    return ans
